text: Ehara taku toa i te toa takitahi, engari he toa takitini.
translation: My strength is not that of an individual, but that of the collective.

text: He aha te mea nui o te ao? He tāngata, he tāngata, he tāngata.
translation: What is the most important thing in the world? It is people, it is people, it is people.

text: Whāia te iti kahurangi, ki te tūohu koe, me he maunga teitei.
translation: Pursue excellence – if you stumble, let it be over a lofty mountain.

text: Kia kaha, kia māia, kia manawanui.
translation: Be strong, be brave, be steadfast.

text: He iti te kōpara, kai takirikiri ana i runga i te kahikatea.
translation: The bellbird may be small, but it can shake the mighty kahikatea tree.
